name: Dog Adoption Application
description: Victorian residents only. This form takes ~10–15 minutes.
footer:
By submitting this form, you declare that all details are accurate to the best of your knowledge.

Upon review and approval, Homeless Hounds will contact you as soon as possible.

We reserve the right to refuse any applicant. We will require the successful applicant to sign an adoption agreement, provide pictures of the yard as you have described above and allowed for a yard check before adoption.

We appreciate you taking the time to complete this application.

fields.name: q01
fields.label: Are you applying for a specific dog or open to any suitable dog?

fields.name: reserveanimalname
fields.label: Dog you are applying for (name or ID)

fields.name: firstname
fields.label: First name

fields.name: lastname
fields.label: Last name

fields.name: dateofbirth
fields.label: Date of birth

fields.name: address
fields.label: Street address

fields.name: city
fields.label: City / Town

fields.name: state
fields.label: State

fields.name: postcode
fields.label: Postcode

fields.name: emailaddress
fields.label: Email address

fields.name: mobiletelephone
fields.label: Phone number

fields.name: q02
fields.label: Your local council (VIC only)

fields.name: q03
fields.label: Briefly describe your household and daily routine for the dog.

fields.name: q04
fields.label: Are there children under 18 who live with or regularly visit the dog?

fields.name: q05
fields.label: If yes, what are the ages?

fields.name: q06
fields.label: Have those children regularly interacted with dogs before?

fields.name: q07
fields.label: Will the dog regularly be around any of the following? (select all that apply)

fields.name: q08
fields.label: If selected, please provide brief details.

fields.name: q09
fields.label: Where will the dog stay when you are out during the day?

fields.name: q10
fields.label: If Outside or Both, provide details (shade, water, shelter, yard size).

fields.name: q11
fields.label: Where will the dog sleep at night?

fields.name: q12
fields.label: If Outside or Both, provide details.

fields.name: q13
fields.label: Will the dog be without human company for periods of the day?

fields.name: q14
fields.label: If yes, about how many hours per day?

fields.name: q15
fields.label: Do you currently have other pets?

fields.name: q16
fields.label: If yes, list species/breed, age, sex, desexed, parasite control, vaccinations, temperament with other animals.

fields.name: q17
fields.label: Tell us about previous dogs you’ve owned (breed, sex, desexed, why no longer with you).

fields.name: q18
fields.label: Do you have experience fostering animals?

fields.name: q19
fields.label: If yes, please provide details.

fields.name: q20
fields.label: How often will you walk the dog? How long? On-lead or off-lead?

fields.name: q21
fields.label: If enquiring about a particular dog, why are you interested in them?

fields.name: q22
fields.label: What are you looking for? (breed, size, age, sex, traits).

fields.name: q23
fields.label: Any breed/traits you would not consider?

fields.name: q24
fields.label: If this dog isn’t a match, would you like us to suggest other suitable dogs?

fields.name: q25
fields.label: If you adopt, how soon could you collect the dog?

fields.name: q26
fields.label: Do you have a yard or safe outdoor area?

fields.name: q27
fields.label: Describe the area (size, fencing type/height, containment, toilet area).

fields.name: q28
fields.label: If you live on acreage, how will you restrain the dog when you’re away?

fields.name: q29
fields.label: Do you have a swimming pool?

fields.name: q30
fields.label: If yes, is the pool securely fenced?

fields.name: q31
fields.label: How do you plan to train the dog?

fields.name: q32
fields.label: If self-training, what methods will you use?

fields.name: q33
fields.label: Should your dog be comfortable at busy dog parks / around many dogs?

fields.name: q34
fields.label: If no/prefer quiet, how will you socialise your dog appropriately?

fields.name: q35
fields.label: Do you own or rent your home?

fields.name: q36
fields.label: If renting, do you have landlord permission to keep a dog?

fields.name: q37
fields.label: Are you an Australian citizen or permanent resident?

fields.name: q38
fields.label: I agree to receive updates from Homeless Hounds (opt out anytime).

fields.name: signature
fields.label: Signature

fields.name: q39
fields.label: Date of signing
